name: Stranded (itch) (Josh Tulleners, ShaneDevsGames)
description:
When a regular fishing trip goes wrong, the player finds themselves Stranded on an island located in the Bermuda Triangle!

Fix the boat through any means necessary!

Craft Machines and Parts


Explore the Mysterious Island

Trade for Valuable Items

Become Friends with the Locals

Download and play for free! The Team:


Josh Tulleners - Team Leader, Game Designer

Shane Rapmund - Art and Environments Director, Programmer

Laura Leesi - Systems Designer, Programmer

Chrishnajuan Caesarius - Artist, Programmer
